attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should honour the Queens coronation speech.She was asked "Will you to the utmost of your power maintain the laws of /God and the true profession of the gospel and the protestant reformed religion established by law?" The Queen replied "All this I promise to do"

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
